Title: Max Manus
Actors: Aksel Hennie, Agnes Kittelsen, Nicolai Cleve Broch, Ken Duken
Plot: The true story about one of the most brilliant saboteurs during World War II and his battle to overcome his inner demons.
Production: Eurimages Fund of the Council of Europe, Norsk Filminstitutt, B&T Film, Miso Film, Filmkameratene A/S, Det Danske Filminstitut
